subNodes.conversationText: Sitting on the little table were all the items Eldest Lady had mentioned -- a seed, a trowel, and a pitcher of water.
The pitcher and the seed remained on the stool.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Only the seed remained on the stool.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Only the pitcher remained on the stool.
There was nothing on the stool now.
The pitcher and trowel remained on the stool.
Only the pitcher remained on the stool.
Only the trowel remained on the stool.
There was nothing on the stool now.
The seed and the trowel remained on the stool.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Only the seed remained on the stool.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Only the trowel remained on the stool.
There was nothing on the stool now.

The only thing remarkable about the trowel was that it, unlike the other tools in the yard, wasn't rusty. The pitcher of water appeared plain enough, too. But the seed struck <FirstName> as unusual. It looked like a long, fat corn kernel, but it was bigger than <his/her> thumb.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Like a gourd seed, <he/she> thought, but far too big.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Like a gourd seed, <he/she> thought, but far too big.
Like a gourd seed, <he/she> thought, but far too big.
Like a gourd seed, <he/she> thought, but far too big.
Like a gourd seed, <he/she> thought, but far too big.
All three items were still on the stool.
The pitcher and the seed remained on the stool.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
The pitcher and trowel remained on the stool.
The seed and the trowel remained on the stool.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Only the seed remained on the stool.
"What kind of seed is this?" <FirstName> called to the house.
Only the pitcher remained on the stool.
Only the trowel remained on the stool.
There was nothing on the stool now.
